启动时隐藏窗口.caption: Minimize to system tray when opening the application

自动启动.caption: Would you like this application to automatically start when the computer boots up? <Note: This will take effect after restarting the application.>

自动启动时隐藏窗口.caption: Minimize this application to the system tray when the computer starts up and automatically launches this application. <Note: This will take effect after restarting the application.>

原始音量增减调节.index: Original volume increase and decrease adjustment
原始音量增减调节.caption: Algorithmly increase/reduce the default volume of the original audio file. Note: The adjustment limit should not be too large. Just adjust the appropriate amount, otherwise the original sound quality of the audio may be destroyed.
